column3: Payment method(Mode by which payment is made)(Any, COD, Prepaid)
column4: Shipping Zone(Zone from which order is placed)(Local, Regional, National, Metropolitan, Special Category Zone)
column5: Product Selling Price( Selling Price of a single unit)
column6: Product Selling Price(Define Minimum value of PSP Range)
column7: Product Selling price(Define Maximum value of PSP Range)
column8: Weight Range(Define minimum value of Weight Range)
column9: Weight Range(Define maximum value of Weight Range)
column10: Fixed Value to be considered for the rule(Fee which is fixed for the rule and would not vary)
column11: Fixed Value to be appilcable on(Per Order Item,Per Order Item,Per shipment)
column12: Variable Value(Fee that will vary with different conditions)
column13: Variable Value to be applicable on(per Shipment,Per order,Per order Item)
column14: Per Additional Value(Change in Variable value added as per defined units)
column15: Percentage Value to be considered for the rule
column16: Then Condition Applicable on(Mandatory when two or more values are added)(Sum of All,Lower,Higher)
